meanings.definition: Rehabilitation facilities for individuals recovering from addiction or injury.
meanings.sent1: The rehabs in our town provide support for those overcoming addiction.
meanings.sent2: She checked into one of the rehabs to get help with her recovery.
meanings.sent3: The rehab center had a funny mascot that made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The rehab was like a safe harbor for those seeking a new beginning.
meanings.sent5: The rehabs were filled with hope and determination for a better future.

meanings.sent1: His rehabs were challenging but necessary for his recovery.
meanings.sent2: After the accident, she started her rehabs to regain strength.
meanings.sent3: The rehab sessions sometimes felt like a workout class.
meanings.sent4: Each rehab was a step closer to feeling whole again.
meanings.sent5: The rehabs required dedication and perseverance to see progress.

meanings.definition: To restore to a good condition or health.
meanings.sent1: She rehabs old furniture to give it a new life.
meanings.sent2: The therapist helped him rehab his injured knee.
meanings.sent3: He decided to rehab his garden over the weekend.
meanings.sent4: The team worked hard to rehab the old building into a modern space.
meanings.sent5: With determination, he was able to rehab his health after the illness.
